title: (x) PR sign on pedestrian route - Arial {Lex}
content:
Hello,

Does anyone Know the type of the PR, of this image.

Thank you very much.

comments.content:
I have already discover

It is transport havy, used on the road signs.

Thank you very much

I’d actually say it’s Arial with the ’R’ fixed up by whomever made the sign.

- Lex

Check out this image from the same site. Definitely Arial’s ’1’:

[http://fotos.sapo.pt/rP9jkpWL41lKfjCE1d2K](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121152818/http:/fotos.sapo.pt/rP9jkpWL41lKfjCE1d2K "http://fotos.sapo.pt/rP9jkpWL41lKfjCE1d2K")

- Lex
